Pythagorean theorm.title: Rearrangement proof
Pythagorean theorm.content: The two large squares shown in the figure each contain four identical triangles, and the only difference between the two large squares is that the triangles are arranged differently.

Pythagorean theorm.title: Other forms of the theorem
Pythagorean theorm.content: If c denotes the length of the hypotenuse and a and b denote the lengths of the other two sides, the Pythagorean theorem can be expressed as the Pythagorean equation:
